class.name: CryptoKey
class.description: A class for cryptographic key management and data encryption/decryption.

constructor.description: Constructs a CryptoKey object with the given size_t key.
constructor.param: The size_t key to initialize the CryptoKey with. Defaults to DefaultKey (0xDEADBEEF).

constructor.description: Constructs a CryptoKey object with the given string key.
constructor.param: The string key to initialize the CryptoKey with.

constructor.description: Constructs a CryptoKey object using the name of the type T.
constructor.param: An instance of a class to derive the key from.

method.description: Sets the cryptographic key to the given size_t value.
method.param: The size_t key value to set.

method.description: Sets the cryptographic key using a string value.
method.param: The string key value to set.

method.description: Sets the cryptographic key using the type name T as a string.
Encrypts the input string using the current key and returns the encrypted result.
Decrypts the input string using the current key and returns the decrypted result.
